response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, reflecting its unique features and craftsmanship. We understand its importance to you, valued at $1,200,000. Our proposal is to offer it to you at a price of $1,350,000. This represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to us and your perceived value, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless transaction and a commitment to meeting your expectations. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
